emails.subject: Your Weekly LinkedIn Digest
emails.body:
Hello Amey Pathe,
Here's your weekly digest from LinkedIn.
Stay updated with the latest news and activities in your professional network.
Best regards, LinkedIn Team

emails.subject: Action Required: Update Your Account Information
emails.body: Dear Microsoft User, </br>Our records indicate that your account information is outdated. </br> To continue using our services without interruption, please update your information by clicking on the link below. </br> https://www.micro-craft.net/update </br> Microsoft Support Team

emails.subject: Your Apple Product Warranty Information
emails.body: Dear Customer, </br>We want to ensure you have all the information you need about your Apple product warranty. </br> Please find attached the warranty details for your recent purchase. </br> If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us. </br> Regards, Apple Support

emails.subject: Rate Your Recent Stay
emails.body:
Hello Bhavesh Patil,
We hope you had a pleasant stay at Example Hotel.
Please take a moment to rate your experience and help us improve our services.
Your feedback is highly appreciated.
Best regards, Booking.com Team

emails.subject: Account Security Alert: Unauthorized Login Attempt
emails.body: Dear PayPal User, </br>Our system has detected a login attempt from an unrecognized device. </br> To secure your account, please click on the link below and verify your identity. </br> https://www.fake-paypal.com/security </br> Regards, PayPal Security Team

emails.subject: Reminder: Pay Your Credit Card Bill
emails.body:
Dear Pratik Dhame,
This is a friendly reminder to pay your credit card bill.
To avoid late fees, please make your payment by the due date.
Thank you for choosing Bank of America.
Sincerely, Bank of America

emails.subject: Immediate Action Required: Verify Your Apple ID
emails.body: Dear Apple User, </br>Your Apple ID requires immediate verification due to recent security concerns. </br> Failure to verify your identity may result in account suspension. </br> Click on the link below to proceed. </br> https://www.appple.net/verify </br> Apple Support Team

emails.subject: Suspicious Activity Detected: Confirm Your Identity
emails.body: Dear Amazon Customer, </br>Our system has flagged suspicious activity on your account. </br> To prevent unauthorized access, please confirm your identity by clicking on the link below. </br> https://www.atoz.com/confirm </br> Amazon Security Team

emails.subject: IRS Tax Refund Notification
emails.body: Dear Taxpayer, </br>Congratulations! You are eligible to receive a tax refund from the IRS. </br> To expedite the process, please provide your personal and banking details by clicking on the link below. </br> https://www.irs.io/refund </br> Sincerely, IRS

emails.subject: Your Monthly Statement
emails.body:
Dear Soham Borkar,
Your monthly statement is now available.
You can view and download your statement by logging into your PayPal account.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
Regards, PayPal Team
